Articles.Content:
So just got a new flight stick and found something rather inconvenient. If you are mid flight you cannot adjust keys as you see fit. So a simple suggestion...allow you to adjust control settings mid flight, rather than having to back all the way out to the start menu. A simple suggestion, and even will allow the player to use the settings menu to look up what the default key bindings are.

If this is a repost I am sorry. Did a quick search in the search bar above and did not see anything. Thanks!
